**Example 1: CreateCRObtain**



Input: 

```
tccli bma CreateCRObtain --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --WorkTitle xx \
    --ObtainDuration 0 \
    --ObtainType 0 \
    --WorkId 0 \
    --TortUrl xx \
    --TortPlat xx \
    --ObtainUrl xx \
    --WorkCategory xx \
    --WorkType xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "TortId": 0,
        "TortNum": "xxx",
        "RequestId": "xx"
    }
}
```
